Rules
The game is played with 6 decks.
The minimum bet is $15 and the max bet is $200.
The player has the option to either hit (add another card) or stay (keep the hand as is).
The game is played as one spot vs. the dealer.
The quit button is located in the top right corner of the betting scene.
Have fun!
About
Hello, I'm Zoey! I made this game and webpage for the Mintbean Junior Developer Hackathon. I chose to do a front-end application because I enjoy working on animation and visual effects. The game was made using Phaser.js and JavaScript, and the webpage design was built using Tailwind CSS. I hope you enjoyed the game!
